actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States should support the courageous efforts of Bishop Desmond Tutu to peacefully end racial segregation in the Republic of South Africa.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the United States should support the efforts of Bishop Desmond Tutu to end racial segregation (apartheid) in South Africa. Urges the South African people to follow his leadership.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States should support the courageous efforts of Bishop Desmond Tutu to peacefully end racial segregation in the Republic of South Africa.
